data.text: @begottensun @povozim Kuda you are a Wiseman  I wonder how many people know that.  You need to get serious and prepare to serve people.  Respect
@begottensun Mmm. So u like drumpf who bases his decision making on falsehood? Doubles down on a lie think that somehow that it me sound true? Mazimba time time. 🤦🏿‍♂️

@Mista_Mani @begottensun We tend to conform to a norm which we don't know of its Genesis. Results are what matters, but results from a realist are the best results. Conforming to a status quo without changing who you are, is truth to yourself and those around you. You can't adjust to everyone's view.

@begottensun At some point you said something I liked,something that made sense that’s why I follow you . Now I can’t imagine what that could have been because here you are making no sense at all🙆🏾‍♀️
@SeiseiNcube @begottensun 😂🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣😂🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣😂🤣😂🤣😂😂😂😂😂😂😂🤣
@begottensun im with you here I dont think people should be caged in the confines"safe box" of societal judgements be free
@begottensun No one has admired Agrippa here. Was just pointing out that Chinoz is an alleged rapist of 2 powerless women.
@begottensun Trump has managed to fulfill a lot of his promises during his campaign period. His American ist policy is proving his enemies wrong

@begottensun Thats the problem....thinking u cn say n do whatever the F comes to mind without evaluating n being considerate of the storm they beget...."who gets hurt,who dies', coz you're too deep soaked in that egoistic bullsh*t

@begottensun I tolerate the hell out of you. I'm saying this as a homie. It's like... my guy pipes up how he admires a paedeophile. My reaction will be 'What the.... Dude, seriously?' A real friend will tell you when you're giving off a dodgy smell.
@Mutizwag1 Semantics
@MurunguMutema Tolerance my homie. I'm not a bad guy. Just a difference in opinion.

@begottensun I think there is no problem when U call yourself" supreme white" or to be super tribe ,I hv problem when you call others "black" or forgotten tribe. No-one is black 

We r not black
@tashiechiguvare @begottensun @povozim My 2 favourite Americans
@begottensun Honesty? Dude... .seriously? Wtf you smoking?

@begottensun True that... only "crazy" people can change the world. Reason why i liked Sankara (yes airasika zvisingaite mufesi uya) and Boris Johnson... i only dislike Malema because i think he's a tard fake.
@begottensun @povozim @merguar
@begottensun Strive at least is intelligent and cares about people. Not just his own interests
@begottensun Trump is like if Chiyangwa becomes president.
@Mista_Mani No body fights against rich fat cats. Strive Masiwa is a rich fat cat.
@JoramMubaiwa Agrippa Mutambara is an ACTUAL rapist and a lot of people still said #CCC kadoibke standard hakasi boo
@begottensun Chinoz is an alleged rapist. Finish and klaar. Nothing to admire.
@begottensun @denvern3 Why did you left the states?

@begottensun Ironically Trump is what you guys fight against everyday in zim. Rich fat cats that go through life trampling everything and because of their wealth get away with it. Wealth is not a flaw, wealth is a privilege and with that privilege comes freedom to do whatever TF you want
@begottensun ...if  Trump is standing for the second term he's gonna win, despite the noise & criticism from CNN..

@begottensun Whilst that may be true by comparison, safety can never be taken for granted..in the moment when one is being attacked on the basis of race you never wish to be in Zim or Africa, you just wish to be safe.
@begottensun @denvern3 I have stopped watching cnn  as well.
@denvern3 Please avoid CNN and that CBS BS. Avoid fox too. Don't be made afraidby people who profit from fear

@denvern3 I promise u. You are safer in the states than anywhere in Africa. In SA a woman is raped every 20 sec.  Black woman by a black man. Every 2min someone is killed. Black on black. Don't let the lefty media make u afraid my brother. Statistically u are safer than Obama era!

@begottensun My worry is for the safety of my family...coz I’m not superman I cant be in 2 places at the same time, that is the part that it is hard to think about. That your innocent child is at risk because she just has a different skin color, it is not a great feeling.

@begottensun I do not doubt your experiences wangu, but you can’t dismiss what my lived reality is based on that. I moved to US in 2016 before the elections and saw the gradual changes first hand. People are now more brazen about the whole deal. If it is me I can fend for myself..

@begottensun That is all true, but here is the interesting thing boss, Trump’s rhetoric and his eventual win has been taken by some quarters to imply a mainstream taking of racism etc. The systemic racism is what is the real danger, it is hard to see but the results are devastating.
@steeversk5 So good. She's a super star that one !!
@begottensun And Chef bae.. She good?

@denvern3 Honestly speaking facts are stubborn. More white people are killed by white police a year. Blacks kill more blacks Evey year in USa. I'd rather be in USA than in Cameroon or Liberia or Haiti I can tell u that. And so would you.

@denvern3 I lived in Australia in 1980 to 1989 homie. I was the only kids there and they called me a Golliwog. I don't behave like a victim coz of it. I did uni in London and dealt with an institution of racist cops. It's nothing. It's the best time for a Black man to be alive. We all know

@begottensun I think you would enjoy being in the US at this time where now more than ever the color of your skin is the summary of your character. It is good to admire Mr Trump from afar like what other Africans did with Mugabe. Living experiences however are harrowing.
@steeversk5 All good homie. They all good
@steeversk5 Lol
@begottensun @begottensun  mwana haasi kuchema here. How is the baby...

I gravitate to people who don't fit in safe boxes. Misfits.  They are the ones crazy enough to change the world. Everyone agrees Steve Jobs was a horrible human. Even denied his own daughter for years. Humans must be diverse. Challenge, offend and counter. Be free  #MAGA

Chinotimba is similar. He doesn't really want your praise and acknowledgement. Temba Mliswa has balls and is irreverant. Fadzayi Mahere speaks her actual mind constantly. Acie Lumumba literally doesnt give a shit what u think of his choices and thoughts.

A lot of Politicians and "woke" people are too afraid to be hated. Toe a bullshit line of conformity and yearning for acceptance. I hate that. Yes Trump is a racist, sexist idiot. But he's also not pretentious. Kanye is conflicted with a lot of thoughts. That's ok. I love Chinos
